title: Little Peasant Wife - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Betrayal   Cooking   Farming   Female Protagonist   Reincarnation   Revenge   Second Chance
author: Meteor   流星
description:
Liu Jin was reborn! She was poisoned by a scum man in her previous life and in this life, she would never let him off. However, in addition to revenge, she still has to face a very wretched and extremely annoying relatives. But, she wasn't afraid, she has culinary skills, and will be able to make fortune with her mother who loves her.

And those extremely annoying relatives, come one, clean up one, come a pair, clean up a pair, sooner or later, they will be cleaned up one day.

She thought that she would never be enamored towards any man in this life, yet she never thought she will met him. It was him who warmed her cold heart with that hot and warm heart.>
